[[inst_c_ldi]]
==== C.LDI

*Syntax:* c.ldi [srcL, simm], ->t

*Description:* Compressed instruction variant (16-bit encoding).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_c_ldi.svg[C.LDI encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* LDA/BASE_IMM

*Compression:* C16 (len=16)

*Uop-Class payload:* `{"addr_mode": "BASE_IMM", "agu_kind": "LDA", "note": "User confirmed all loads are AGU/LDA", "source": "group_rule", "uop_kind": "AGU"}`
